name: Aquent
overview:
Aquent is the global marketing, creative, and digital staffing solutions company for today’s biggest brands.

INDUSTRY EXPERTISE We’re uniquely organized by industry practices to ensure the entire account team has an in-depth understanding of your business. That’s why enterprise companies come to Aquent for marketing, creative, and digital staffing solutions â€”enabling them to scale up resources and add the subject matter experts they need as they need them.

MARKETING /CREATIVE/DIGITAL SPECIALIZATION Our agents focus exclusively on staffing marketing, creative, and digital roles for your industry, making them uniquely positioned to connect you to the right candidates. Our agents share an incredible pool of specialized talent from around the globe.

EXCEPTIONAL TALENT Our talent have in-depth industry experience at marquee brands, spanning marketing, creative, digital, communications, and user experience. They have helped the world’s largest companies to increase sales, improve retention rates, and engage consumers in new ways while reducing the overall creative staffing spend.

TAILOR-MADE STAFFING SOLUTIONS Our consultative approach to staffing your marketing, creative, and digital organizations is one of the reasons we’ve been a strategic staffing partner to the world’s most successful brands for more than 25 years.

GLOBAL FOOTPRINT With offices across the US and in Canada, the UK, the Netherlands, France, Australia, and Japan, we help our clients across the globe.

Are you a small or medium size company or an ad agency looking for creative, marketing, or interactive talent? Contact our new division Vitamin T.
